sections.headline: Your data never leaves your browser

cards.title: 100% Client-Side Processing
cards.description: All analysis happens in your browser using JavaScript. We never upload your Amazon data to our servers.

cards.title: No API Connection Required
cards.description: Start immediately without giving us write access to your Amazon account. Upload reports manually or use read-only API later.
